sentences.sContent: Instead, they wobbled along the equator before fizzling out.
sentences.sCn: 相反，它们一直在赤道附近摇晃，直到消失。

sentences.sContent: 中文例句：a small village near the equator

remMethod.val: equat(看作equal， 相等的) ＋ or → 使地球上下相等的分界线 → 赤道

trans.tranOther: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole
